name: Archival information cannot be traced to a received package
description: An archival object cannot be traced to a corresponding received package or selection of packages.
notes:
- Are policies and procedures in place to validate that archived content corresponds with what was originally submitted?
- Is ingested content subject to transformation to an archival package? 

The full description of this risk has been obtained from examples provided in DRAMBORA - Digital Repository Audit Method Based on Risk Assessment, March 2007, Digital Curation Centre (DCC) and Digital Preservation Europe (DPE), http://www.repositoryaudit.eu/
preMitigationNotes: - Repository cannot identify the origins of an archived package in order to ensure that its integrity has been adequately preserved
mitigationStrategy:
Avoidance strategies:
- Record appropriate provenance information, detailing interactions undertaken during receipt and ingest process In the event of riskâ€™s execution:
- Maintain policy and procedure to determine whether package is disposed of, returned or retained
identifiedBy: DRAMBORA - Digital Repository Audit Method Based on Risk Assessment
